---------------------------------- Career Objective:
Exceptionally  creative  and resourceful Electrical  Engineer with stellar  record of safety and
customer service. Able to handle multiple projects simultaneously with high professionalism and
accuracy. Adept at short and long-term electrical system troubleshooting.
Professional Qualification:
Bachelor of Technology in  Electrical and Electronics Engineering with  2nddivision in 2012
from “Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University ”, Hyderabad (A.P)
Academic Qualification:

Certificate:

Strengths:
Hard working nature.
Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new environment. 
Punctual at work and flexibility to work at late hours.
Clarity in thinking and careful planning.
Managerial ability.
Effective communication ability.
Academic Project:
Title: four quadrant speed controller of dc motor.
Aim:  the main aim of the project is to develop speed control system for dc motor
using four-quadrant chopper.
Experience:
Working as an ELECTRICAL SITE ENGINEER in POWER ERECTORS  from July
2012 to till date.
Job Responsibilities :
Maintain the manpower management.
Responsibility of erection of all electrical equipment like LA, CVT, CT, PT, BPI, WT,
PANELS, D.G and towers.
Laying responsibility of ms rod for earthing of switchyard.
Maintaining the records of all measurements, equipment erection dates.
Responsible for equipment testing in substation.
Responsible for stability testing, C.T testing, P.T testing, and Reactor testing.
Prepare the joint measurement sheet.
Estimating the quantity of materials for upcoming works
Communicate with clients for better way of work.
Assisting the project manager for making running bills.
Making the monthly plan for better, safe, and fast work.
Responsibility of megger testing of all electrical equipments before the erection.
Making the lightening protection system for GIS hall and control room building .
Assisting the GIS supervisor for all GIS  equipment  erection  like  CB, CT, VT, and
ISOLATORS.
Responsible for all tools which is using in AIS and GIS equipments erection.
Responsible for cable laying and termination work as per given schedule.
Maintaining the records of all measurements, equipment erection dates.
Responsible for the quality of all consumable items which is using at site.
Responsible for making running bills.Projects:
